member.summary: Close the instance as an asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket.SendAsync(System.ArraySegment{System.Byte},System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketMessageType,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Send data on as an asynchronous operation.
member.returns: Returns .The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
member.param: The buffer containing the message to be sent.
Specifies whether the buffer is clear text or in a binary format.
Specifies whether this is the final asynchronous send. Set to true if this is the final send; false otherwise.
A cancellation token used to propagate notification that this operation should be canceled.
